price: 64. Loba: Eh bino bato baye bozua buku! Boya na liloba moko oyo ekosangisa biso na bino ete: Tobondela Nzambe mosusu te sé Allah, mpe tosangisa ye na eloko te, mpe tozua ba Nkolo misusu te na botıki Allah. Soki bapesi mokongo, boloba na bango ete: Bozala banzeneneke ete biso nde tozali bandimi.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ تَعَالَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ كَلِمَةٖ سَوَآءِۭ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ أَلَّا نَعۡبُدَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ وَلَا نُشۡرِكَ بِهِۦ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَتَّخِذَ بَعۡضُنَا بَعۡضًا أَرۡبَابٗا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُولُواْ ٱشۡهَدُواْ بِأَنَّا مُسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi taʿālaw ilā kalimatin sawāin baynanā wabaynakum allā naʿbuda illā al-laha walā nush'rika bihi shayan walā yattakhidha baʿḍunā baʿḍan arbāban min dūni al-lahi fa-in tawallaw faqūlū ish'hadū bi-annā mus'limūna
